title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: November 01, 2022, 01:41:13 PMLast edit: June 22, 2023, 03:54:37 PM by julerz12
content: Moonbet.io's Social Media Campaign has officially ended.The overall campaign spreadsheet will now be finalized and the bounty rewards will be distributed within 1 to 2 weeks right after the Final List is completed.This bounty thread and all the forms are now closed.[EDIT]12/5/22All the bounty rewards have been distributed: https://bscscan.com/tx/0xed4f92b6483519e87526fd5ac4469fb9ce3f633be3b9881f6446cd70fbd12111  NOTE    The USD value of MBET Token rewards is calculated based on the current market price at the time it was sent to the official escrow address. The final MBET Tokens that will be sent as rewards will be based on this USD value. [ TXID ].....[ WEBSITE ]....[ TWITTER ]....[ FACEBOOK ]....[ INSTAGRAM ]....[ TELEGRAM ]....[ REDDIT ]....[ MEDIUM ]....[ YOUTUBE ].....Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.

The final MBET Tokens that will be sent as rewards will be based on this USD value. [ TXID ]WEEKLY REPORTS FOR TWITTER, REDDIT & INSTAGRAM CAMPAIGN MUST BE SUBMITTED THROUGH THE REPORT FORM. [SEE THE 1ST POST ABOVE FOR THE REPORT FORM LINK]WEEKLY DEADLINE FOR REPORT SUBMISSION: TUESDAY [UTC]WEEKLY REPORTS POSTED ON THIS BOUNTY THREAD WILL NOT BE CHECKED/ACCEPTED/COUNTED AND WILL BE DELETED TO AVOID UNNECESSARY SPAM POSTS.[/size]....PROOF OF AUTHENTICATION POST FORMAT....Fill up the format below and post it on this bounty thread for verification purposes.[ Mandatory to all bounty campaign participants ]Code:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username: Bitcointalk Profile Link: Telegram Username:Campaign Category Participated: BSC Wallet Address:....WEEKLY DATES....WEEK 1 [ 11/2 - 11/8 ].....  WEEK 2 [ 11/9 - 11/15 ] WEEK 3 [ 11/16 - 11/22 ].....  WEEK 4 [ 11/23 - 11/29 ]....PROFILE PICTURE....Download: https://imgur.com/5WvZqVO....COVER PHOTO....Download: https://imgur.com/6bbFMHd....DISPLAY NAME....Code:Moonbet.ioDisclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
